New Records: Los Angeles Dodgers pitchers tied the postseason record of 33 consecutive scoreless innings
Key Match Events: Jack Flaherty combined on a three-hitter
Shohei Ohtani was 2 for 4 with a walk while scoring two runs and driving in another
Mookie Betts added a three-run double in the eighth
Pre-Game Insights: The Dodgers opened their pursuit of a record 25th NL pennant by chasing Kodai Senga after 1 1/3 innings of his just third overall start in a year decimated by injuries
Post-Match Reflections: Bill Belichick reportedly garnering NFL interest after accepting UNC job
Kirby Smart's father, Sonny, died Saturday of complications from hip surgery after falling in New Orleans ahead of the Sugar Bowl
Miscellaneous Highlights: The largest shutout victory margin in Dodgers postseason history
The Mets' most one-sided postseason shutout defeat
